products.title: Turin 25mm Perforated White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Perforated 25 is a range of beautiful venetian blinds, available in beautiful tones. This classic white aluminium venetian blind is perfect for offices and kitchens as will go with existing decor due to its neutral tone. products.title: Perforated Aluminium Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated aluminium filtra perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.
